```{r}
###Obsolete; no longer in thesis
require(data.table)
require(ggplot2)
ds = fread("Figures + Data/Runtime.csv")

ds = ds[grep("Simulation4",sim_num)]
ds = ds[order(sim_num)]
ds[,Read_Length:=factor(c("100 to 200","500 to 600","1000 to 1100"),levels=c("100 to 200","500 to 600","1000 to 1100"))]

ds[,read_length_desc:=factor(c("Short Reads","Medium Reads","Long Reads"),levels=c("Short Reads","Medium Reads","Long Reads"))]

ggplot(ds,aes(x=read_length_desc, y=runtime_num, fill=read_length_desc)) + 
    geom_bar(stat="identity") + 
    ggtitle("Read Mapping Time by Simulation") +
    xlab("Simulation Type")+ylab("Minutes") +
    theme_bw() +
    theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),legend.position = "none")
    # guides(fill=guide_legend(title="Simulation Type"))
```
